personal_info.summary: I am a student of the University Technician in Programming program at the National Technological University (UTN) in Argentina, currently finishing my second year and looking to join a work team. I am a committed and enthusiastic professional with a constant desire for personal and professional growth. I adapt quickly to new challenges and environments, and have extensive experience in teamwork, effective communication, empathy, conflict resolution, and emotional intelligence. These skills enable me to contribute positively to any team or project.

education.institution: UNLP National University of La Plata

projects.name: C# ASP.NET E-commerce
projects.description: E-Commerce project primarily written in C#, utilizing ASP.NET for web development and TSQL for database management.

projects.name: C# ASP.NET WebApp
projects.description: Project using the C# language and ASP.NET, developing a web app that validates a code in an SQL database to display products stored there.

projects.name: C# WinForms
projects.description: Project written in C# and using Windows Forms, connecting to an SQL database containing a variety of listed products.

projects.name: C++ Warehouse Management System
projects.description: Warehouse management system as a console application made with C++ as an integrative practical work for the University's Computer Laboratory II course.

projects.name: Backend final project
projects.description: Repository with the code for the final project of the Coderhouse Backend course.

projects.name: E-Commerce Online Plant Shop
projects.description: Web page made with HTML, CSS, SCSS, and JS for a plant shop with a product catalog and shopping cart.

projects.name: C++ Console App Clutch
projects.description: Repository hosting the code developed for Laboratory I of TUP, creating a card game called Clutch as a console application in C++ language.

projects.name: Web page Astillero Bahia
projects.description: Web Development course project. It is a website made with HTML, CSS, and SCSS.

projects.name: ReactJS E-Commerce Hathi Drink Shop
